keyFacts: This service request is for a RAID system failure at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
The failure occurred on August 8, 2019, just two days before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The system in question is a NICE Vision Pro Unit NVR, which is a video recording system.
The RAID failure involved 2 bad drives, and improper handling during replacement corrupted the video database.
The timing and location of this technical issue are significant given Epstein's death occurred at this facility during this timeframe.
